Description: A serial number on a Communication Module shall be positioned so that it is not visible on the front of the Metering Unit.
Events in the Metering System shall be logged in an event list in HES.
In HES, it should be possible to analyze and visualize PQ values in e.g. graphs and bar plots.
HES should be able to run on virtual servers as well as physical ones.
It shall be possible to view the communication status of the Metering Unit directly, without manual intervention and without opening the meter.
